window.title: Window management
window.description:
Open window management.
Leave corresponding entity_id empty if not used
You can also configure automatic window open detection based on temperature decrease

data.window_auto_open_threshold: Temperature decrease threshold for automatic window open detection (in °/hours)
data.window_auto_close_threshold: Temperature increase threshold for end of automatic detection (in °/hours)
data.window_auto_max_duration: Maximum duration of automatic window open detection (in min)

data_description.window_sensor_entity_id: Leave empty if no window sensor should be used
data_description.window_delay: The delay in seconds before sensor detection is taken into account
data_description.window_auto_open_threshold: Recommended value: between 3 and 10. Leave empty if automatic window open detection is not used
data_description.window_auto_close_threshold: Recommended value: 0. Leave empty if automatic window open detection is not used
data_description.window_auto_max_duration: Recommended value: 60 (one hour). Leave empty if automatic window open detection is not used
data_description.use_window_central_config: Check to use the central window configuration. Uncheck to use a specific window configuration for this VTherm

motion.title: Motion management
motion.description:
Motion sensor management. Preset can switch automatically depending on motion detection
Leave corresponding entity_id empty if not used.
motion_preset and no_motion_preset should be set to the corresponding preset name

data_description.motion_sensor_entity_id: The entity id of the motion sensor
data_description.motion_preset: Preset to use when motion is detected
data_description.no_motion_preset: Preset to use when no motion is detected
data_description.use_motion_central_config: Check to use the central motion configuration. Uncheck to use a specific motion configuration for this VTherm

power.title: Power management
power.description:
Power management attributes.
Gives the power and max power sensor of your home.
Then specify the power consumption of the heater when on.
All sensors and device power should have the same unit (kW or W).
Leave corresponding entity_id empty if not used.

data_description.use_power_central_config: Check to use the central power configuration. Uncheck to use a specific power configuration for this VTherm

presence.title: Presence management
presence.description:
Presence management attributes.
Gives the a presence sensor of your home (true is someone is present).
Then specify either the preset to use when presence sensor is false or the offset in temperature to apply.
If preset is given, the offset will not be used.
Leave corresponding entity_id empty if not used.

data.boost_ac_away_temp: Boost pres et in AC mode

data_description.eco_away_temp: Temperature in Eco preset when no presence
data_description.comfort_away_temp: Temperature in Comfort preset when no presence
data_description.boost_away_temp: Temperature in Boost preset when no presence
data_description.frost_away_temp: Temperature in Frost protection preset when no presence
data_description.eco_ac_away_temp: Temperature in Eco preset when no presence in AC mode
data_description.comfort_ac_away_temp: Temperature in Comfort preset when no presence in AC mode
data_description.boost_ac_away_temp: Temperature in Boost preset when no presence in AC mode
data_description.use_presence_central_config: Check to use the central presence configuration. Uncheck to use a specific presence configuration for this VTherm

advanced.title: Advanced parameters
advanced.description:
Configuration of advanced parameters. Leave the default values if you don't know what you are doing.
These parameters can lead to very poor temperature control or bad power regulation.

data.security_min_on_percent: Minimal power percent to enable security mode
data.security_default_on_percent: Power percent to use in security mode

data_description.minimal_activation_delay: Delay in seconds under which the equipment will not be activated
data_description.security_delay_min: Maximum allowed delay in minutes between two temperature measurements. Above this delay the thermostat will turn to a security off state
data_description.security_min_on_percent: Minimal heating percent value for security preset activation. Below this amount of power percent the thermostat won't go into security preset
data_description.security_default_on_percent: The default heating power percent value in security preset. Set to 0 to switch off heater in security preset
data_description.use_advanced_central_config: Check to use the central advanced configuration. Uncheck to use a specific advanced configuration for this VTherm

error.window_open_detection_method: Only one window open detection method should be used. Use either window sensor or automatic detection through temperature threshold but not both
error.no_central_config: You cannot check 'use central configuration' because no central configuration was found. You need to create a Versatile Thermostat of type 'Central Configuration' to use it.
